date.headline: Marx, Karl.
date.text:
http://search.socialhistory.org/Record/642013
245 Beelddocument = Visual document.
260 1891 ([s.l. : s.n.], 1982)
300 44x31 cm.
500 One of the numbered copies, made in 1982 from the original woodblock, executed in 1891 by Scheu after a photo he got from Engels. This print was dedicated to the participants of the Internationale Tagung der Historiker der Arbeiterbewegung (ITH) Marxismus und Geschichtswissenschaft in 1983. Accompanying letter containing some further information in IISG-archive.
650 Portrait. (NL-AMISG)306035
655 Print. (NL-AMISG)262665
856 http://hdl.handle.net/10622/30051000116787
